Title: [P] AI Task Router - Open-source intelligent LLM routing for cost optimization

I built an open-source library that intelligently routes LLM requests across multiple providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, AI Badgr) to optimize costs while maintaining quality.

**The Problem:**
Most AI apps route everything to GPT-4, even simple tasks that could use cheaper models. This wastes 80%+ on API costs.

**The Solution:**
AI Task Router automatically routes requests based on task complexity:
- Simple chat â†’ AI Badgr ($0.003/1K tokens)
- Complex reasoning â†’ GPT-4 ($0.03/1K tokens)
- Code tasks â†’ Claude ($0.015/1K tokens)

**Key Features:**
- Intelligent task-based routing
- Automatic fallback for rate limits/errors
- Built-in cost tracking per request
- OpenAI-compatible API
- Full TypeScript support
- Streaming responses

**Real-world Savings:**
A chatbot with 1M requests/month: $270 instead of $3,000 ($32,760/year savings)

**Installation:**
```bash

```

**GitHub:** https://github.com/michaelbrinkworth/ai-task-router

MIT licensed, fully tested, production-ready.

Looking for feedback from the community! What cost optimization strategies are you using?

```
### r/node
```
Title: AI Task Router - Intelligent LLM routing library for Node.js

Built a Node.js library for intelligent routing across multiple AI providers (OpenAI, Claude, AI Badgr).

**Features:**
- 80%+ cost savings through smart routing
- Automatic fallback handling
- Built-in cost tracking
- OpenAI-compatible API
- Full TypeScript support
- < 100KB bundle size

**Use Cases:**
- Chatbots & AI agents
- Workflow automation (n8n, Flowise)
- Developer tools (Continue, Cursor)
- Data processing pipelines

**Quick Start:**
```javascript
import { createRouter } from "@aibadgr/ai-task-router";

const router = createRouter({
  providers: {
    aibadgr: { apiKey: process.env.AIBADGR_API_KEY }
  }
});

const result = await router.run({
  task: "chat",
  input: "Hello!"
});
```

MIT licensed: https://github.com/michaelbrinkworth/ai-task-router

AI Task Router automatically routes by task complexity:
- Simple chat â†’ AI Badgr ($0.003/1K tokens)

- Automatic fallback (rate limits, timeouts, errors)
